Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy to admit that I'm a hopeless optimist

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: Where educational deprivation exists, it breeds conflict and enables repression

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people are attracted to teaching because they want to make a real impact

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the way to understand Teach for America is as a leadership development program

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: I usually don't really have breakfast

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: We go around and talk about what are each of the kids most proud of from the previous week

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: School boards can be a steppingstone to higher forms of political leadership

Quote.Author: Wendy Kopp
Quote.QuoteValue: Teach For America is working hard to be one significant source of the leadership we need

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: My character in 'Prison Break' needs to be formidable. In reality, I'm not very tough at all

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I revise obsessively. It's important to me to have a clean page

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel extremely lucky, extremely grateful, and a little bittersweet, too

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty much a couch potato

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: You only cry for help if you believe there is help to cry for

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting was something I needed like air. It wasn't something I could walk away from

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, I'm allergic to all animals and even some people

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has their challenges

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm neither sexy nor a star

Quote.Author: Wentworth Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Michael Scofield is someone everyone can relate to, but nobody would want to be in his shoes

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man should pull a boat over a mountain once in his life

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer to be alive, so I'm cautious about taking risks

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm simply not afraid. It's not in my dictionary of behaviour

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it is a quest of literature throughout the ages to describe the human condition

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: The universe is monstrously indifferent to the presence of man

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't spend sleepless nights over getting very bad reviews

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not into digital marketing, downloading, or streaming - I've always been a man of the theaters

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there should be holy war against yoga classes

Quote.Author: Werner Herzog
Quote.QuoteValue: I think psychology and self-reflection is one of the major catastrophes of the twentieth century

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: How can you have 'Scream' without Ghostface? It's like 'Friday the 13th' without Jason

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: The first monster you have to scare the audience with is yourself

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: I've experienced a great deal of, you know, ostracism from the making of films

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: I never went to film school, so I never had the chance to be rejected

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have a name that means scares, you have to live with that

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't even know what a horror film was. I kind of made it up as I went along

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: All I'm doing is rearranging the curtains in the insane asylum

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm going to be a caged bird, I'll sing the best song I can

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the kind of director, at any given moment, an idea occurs to me, I'll just do it

Quote.Author: Wes Craven
Quote.QuoteValue: You learn a lot more from those bumps than from when things are going great

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see myself as extremely handsome. I just figure I can charm you into liking me

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of myself as a young prince from a long line of royalty

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really planned on making action films. It just kind of happened

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was pretty much on my case all the time

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think any man would be nervous if his liberty is at stake

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: We should be able to go to our government and get clear answers

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I have kind of a natural magnetism

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to read about different religions - Judaism, Islam, Christianity, Hinduism and Buddhism

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I was convicted of three misdemeanors of willful failure to file a form

Quote.Author: Wesley Snipes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a good mimic

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it preferable not to have public opinions about anything. It's good for me to shut up

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're doing the work, film and TV are exactly the same. TV is just film in reduced pieces

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm totally devoted to '30s cinema

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes it's the things you don't like that give you inspiration

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I identify entirely with Jane Austen's point of view, on everything

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very concerned about the countries bordering Russia. But let's stay off that stuff

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: I like things that are sort of comic and humorous rather than satirical

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: There are bad preppies and bad priests and bad humanitarians. Any group can have its bad apple

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to end up in the perfect future is to invent it yourself

Quote.Author: Whit Stillman
Quote.QuoteValue: My guilty pleasure is watching the Investigation Discovery channel

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I have priorities. Maintaining my daughter is my first

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm older, I'm matured... I'm looking forward to the years to come. Good years

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: When I decided to be a singer, my mother warned me I'd be alone a lot. Basically we all are

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: God gave me a voice to sing with, and when you have that, what other gimmick is there?

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I almost wish I could be more exciting, that I could match what is happening out there to me

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: From the beginning, the camera and I were great friends. It loves me, and I love it

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just fiercely protective. It's like, that's my lair and nobody messes with my lair

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I think over the years, being a mother, I've matured in so many ways

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm good where I am at this moment

Quote.Author: Whitney Houston
Quote.QuoteValue: What's in your soul is in your soul

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Normal is nothing more than a cycle on a washing machine

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I used my imagination to make the grass whatever color I wanted it to be

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the thing about Mother Nature, she really doesn't care what economic bracket you're in

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I am where I am because I believe in all possibilities

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to vote for someone. It's a shame, but it's got to be done

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything for me is visual. That's just how my head works

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Normal is in the eye of the beholder

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: An actress can only play a woman. I'm an actor, I can play anything

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really view communism as a bad thing

Quote.Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Born ham, that's basically me

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Defect-free software does not exist

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Lack of documentation is becoming a problem for acceptance

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: For many people my software is something that you install and forget. I like to keep it that way

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing software that's safe even in the presence of bugs makes the challenge even more interesting

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: One bug in an SMTP server can open up the whole machine for intrusion

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: The Postfix security model is based on keeping software simple and stupid

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the effort in the software business goes into the maintenance of code that already exists

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Adding functionality is not just a matter of adding code

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: My reply is: the software has no known bugs, therefore it has not been updated

Quote.Author: Wietse Venema
Quote.QuoteValue: Windows favors multi-threading, which means that a service is implemented by one single process

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I think one of the most poignant things is unrequited love and loneliness

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature throws us many great heroes. Real life invariably outdoes them

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I put my soul into every book I write

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the sea as much as I love the veldt of Africa

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: What I like about writing is the sense of godlike power it gives you

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never had too much trouble for creative ideas to spring up in my mind

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: My father was my god. His approval was so valuable to me

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It's probably true that everyone has a book in them, although it may not be a very good one

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing so aphrodisiacal for a woman as money and success

Quote.Author: Wilbur Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, my characters are more real than most people I meet

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I am happy because I'm grateful. I choose to be grateful. That gratitude allows me to be happy

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Pure unadulterated success is not as funny as failure

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very rare that people are exactly who they appear to be

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything's not black and white. We choose to make bad decisions or not

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Arrested Development opened a lot of doors for me

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Yeah, you know, within the context of TV families, these are pretty unsavory characters

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, we were never coming back to Fox... that was clear

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: The show had run its course on the Fox network

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not necessarily interested in telling the story of people who are super likable

Quote.Author: Will Arnett
Quote.QuoteValue: At no point was I like, 'Man, I gotta write me a part where people are going to take me seriously'

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Inappropriate behavior makes me laugh

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing sexy about Orange County

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: You tend to get reluctant to talk about anything until the day before filming

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Aren't we all striving to be overpaid for what we do?

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to sail around the world in a handmade boat, and I built a boat

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really have aspirations to be Tom Hanks

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who does anything creative is always gonna want to change

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess ultimately a lot of comedians just wanna be taken seriously

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Cancer; I'm music-passionate. I like long walks on the beach

Quote.Author: Will Ferrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a gourmet chef. I love cooking - mostly Thai food

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: It is more rewarding to be complicit with scarcity than excess

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: I like rural areas

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to be able to backtrack and not be embarrassed by the music you used to listen to

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: I really hate press

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: It's O.K. to accept good fortune

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everybody works from a defensive position, for the most part, in the film industry

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: People are looking for fame or a focus, and I can't provide that

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: Cities are made for enemies to destroy

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: I figure it's okay to make certain rules, whether or not people despise you for it at the time

Quote.Author: Will Oldham
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I always thought that acting was going to be the way to go

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love fashion. I shop like a 16-year old girl. Sneakers. That's what I spend money I don't have on

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I have got some fantastic friendships that I have had for a long, long time

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I've not really been let down by anyone I've admired and then worked with

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I absolutely love Leonardo DiCaprio

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to try and get away from that brat role, or people are going to think I'm a natural brat

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the biggest Kanye and Jay Z fan

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: Al Pacino never looks like he's being filmed

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the camaraderie that develops on film sets and ensemble casts. It's really special

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to do some motion capture work just to be able to challenge myself

Quote.Author: Will Poulter
Quote.QuoteValue: I fully accepted that I cannot grow facial hair, but it is quite emasculating

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all right-listening folk, I am an implacable enemy of all muzak

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: The novelist, quite rightly, fears the psychoanalyst as both an enemy and a usurper

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the crowd is the madness - at others it's the absence of the crowd that is

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: It could be argued that every age gets the comfort savagery writer it deserves

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: Who'd want to be a modernist writer in the English-speaking world?

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: As the render is to the building, and the blueprint to the machine, so sport is to social existence

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not that sport, over-indulged in, coarsens the mind; it is that it dulls it

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: I do have a fantasy life in which I can grout bathrooms - but not for a living

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: I loathe computers more and more, so I have one I can shut down and shelve like a book

Quote.Author: Will Self
Quote.QuoteValue: A party full of 'likeable' people doesn't bear contemplating

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The first step is you have to say that you can

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: So if you stay ready, you ain't gotta get ready, and that is how I run my life

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The things that have been most valuable to me I did not learn in school

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I want the world to be better because I was here

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever your dream is, every extra penny you have needs to be going to that

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I would have absolutely messed up 'The Matrix'

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is lived on the edge

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: You can cry, ain't no shame in it

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: In my mind, I've always been an A-list Hollywood superstar. Y'all just didn't know yet

Quote.Author: Will Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: A rapper is about being completely true to yourself. Being an actor is about changing who you are

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born and raised in the ghetto, on welfare, two minutes from homeless

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: It should be mandatory that you understand computer science

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: My attention span is very short

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like politics

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been truly protected by my uncles

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like seeing kids inspired

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I know people in gangs; I could have went down that route

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a pro tools rig that I carry in my backpack

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I can procrastinate a little bit

Quote.Author: will.i.am
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have political agendas. I have social agendas

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: Some memories are realities, and are better than anything that can ever happen to one again

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there is great love, there are always wishes

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: A work-room should be like an old shoe; no matter how shabby, it's better than a new one

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: I like trees because they seem more resigned to the way they have to live than other things do

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the basic material a writer works with is acquired before the age of fifteen

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: Every artist makes himself born. It is very much harder than the other time, and longer

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: Winter lies too long in country towns; hangs on until it is stale and shabby, old and sullen

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: That is happiness; to be dissolved into something complete and great

Quote.Author: Willa Cather
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact that I was a girl never damaged my ambitions to be a pope or an emperor

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Thanksgiving just gets me all warm and tingly and all kinds of wonderful inside

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone complains about the weather, but nobody ever seems to do anything about it

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Never slap a man who chews tobacco

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: It was a big story and yesterday's soup. Who cares?

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I've ever done in my life has been a fluke

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I go to McDonald's at least once a week. I always get a No. 2

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to do 'Saturday Night Live.'

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: There are plenty of good-looking women out there. Go get them

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Take a microphone out of my hands, and I'm just plain folks

Quote.Author: Willard Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the best job in the entire history of broadcasting

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a real wisdom to not saying a thing

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: I am confident only when I am constantly in motion. Between projects, the doubt creeps in

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, when I hear the words 'family drama,' I run in the opposite direction

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: The best thing an actor can be is ready. Be flexible, be ready

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: Action breeds inspiration more than inspiration breeds action

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: Corruption is something you face all the time. Avoid it

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to lose yourself to find yourself

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing is to get involved with people who aren't passionate about what they're doing

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: Weirdness is not my game. I'm just a square boy from Wisconsin

Quote.Author: Willem Dafoe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never be able to really see a film that I'm in

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: God gave you a gift of 86,400 seconds today. Have you used one to say 'thank you?'

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Change, like sunshine, can be a friend or a foe, a blessing or a curse, a dawn or a dusk

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: To make mistakes is human; to stumble is commonplace; to be able to laugh at yourself is maturity

Quote.Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is an inside job

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: Think like a wise man but communicate in the language of the people

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: Those that I fight I do not hate, those that I guard I do not love

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: We make out of the quarrel with others, rhetoric, but of the quarrel with ourselves, poetry

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent perceives differences; genius, unity

Quote.Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote.QuoteValue: If suffering brings wisdom, I would wish to be less wise

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Where hast thou wandered, gentle gale, to find the perfumes thou dost bring?

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Go forth under the open sky, and list To Nature's teachings

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Remorse is virtue's root; its fair increase are fruits of innocence and blessedness

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: The groves were God's first temples

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: The little windflower, whose just opened eye is blue as the spring heaven it gazes at

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything in second place

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: The February sunshine steeps your boughs and tints the buds and swells the leaves within

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: All that tread, the globe are but a handful to the tribes, that slumber in its bosom

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain dies quickly, and lets her weary prisoners go; the fiercest agonies have shortest reign

Quote.Author: William C. Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: A sculptor wields The chisel, and the stricken marble grows To beauty

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Ford comes first before everything else I do in my life

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe fuel cells could end the 100-year reign of the internal combustion engine

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if a company can have a soul, but I like to think it can

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to wonder if running a large industrial company would really square with my values

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The climate is changing, and anyone who disagrees is, in my view, still in denial

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no patience for wasting time

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: The Ford family wants the company to succeed. Period

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ever want to believe my own press clippings, good or bad

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: We took our eye off the ball as a company

Quote.Author: William Clay Ford, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: S.U.V.'s are under a lot of scrutiny these days, and yet the S.U.V. buyer is a very loyal lot

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Never go to bed angry, stay up and fight

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Uncertainty and expectation are the joys of life. Security is an insipid thing

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is the lover's gift

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: If this be not love, it is madness, and then it is pardonable

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: A hungry wolf at all the herd will run, In hopes, through many, to make sure of one

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: A little disdain is not amiss; a little scorn is alluring

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief walks upon the heels of pleasure; married in haste, we repent at leisure

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved

Quote.Author: William Congreve
Quote.QuoteValue: Wit must be foiled by wit: cut a diamond with a diamond

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Glory, built on selfish principles, is shame and guilt

Quote.Author: William Cowper
Quote.QuoteValue: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor
